The claim was initially made by a Facebo: stating that "Nevada AG Admits to Changing Signature Verifications Manually for Over 200,000 Votes."
Expert sources: such as James Dehaven and Jon Ralston, deny any knowledge of Nevada Attorney General Aaron Ford making such a statement and dismiss the claim as baseless.
The quote in question actually comes fro: a Republican and co-chairman of the Trump campaign in Nevada, who made the statement during an interview with Fox News.
While Laxalt alleges manipulated voting: in ballot system, he does not provide concrete evidence that specific votes were changed.
